value.string: ********This Bot will read the Config file and create the screenshot folder if it does not exist*********

***********************************This Bot will read all the config Files Data and will store it into a variable and will also create a varscreenshot folder if it does not exist*******************************************

value.expression:
Log file - $varLogsFolder$
Error screen shot - $varScreenshotPath$
Local folder location - $varLocalFolderPath$
Bot Email address - $varBOTEmailAddress$
RPA Prod Email Team - $varRpaProdTeamEmailAddress$
Stake Holder Email address - $varStakeHoldersEmailAddress$
Start Email subject - $varEmailSubjectStartEmail$
Start Email content - $varEmailBodyStartEmail$
Hard Stop Email Subject - $varEmailSubjectHardstop$
Hard Stop Email Content - $varEmailBodyHardstop$
Completion Email Subject - $varEmailSubjectCompletionEmail$
Completion Email Content - $varEmailBodyCompletionEmail$
Reminder Email Subj - $varEmailSubjectReminderEmail$
Reminder Email Body - $varEmailBodyReminderEmail$
Email Host Name -$varEmailHostName$
Email port number - $varEmailPortNo$
Email user Name - $varEmailUserName$
